messages.message:
Some of our container images are massive
model-service 3.9GB
model-training-tasks 3.3GB
model-training-tasks-GPU 6.4GB
docops-service 3.1GB
webdriver-tasks 2GB
The other 25 odd images are <= 1GB
A good fraction of deploy time is just time spent uploading to container registry. Also don't think customer enjoy having to download big images :smile:
Wondering if there are some easy wins here to trim the container size.
